koohiiStory1: Opening a stuck valve requires 2 hands and a lot of elbow grease.
koohiiStory2: The cubans build a pipe to flood the USA. Castro just has to turn the valve on it, and USA is flooded. Suddenly, CIA agents tackle him from behind, grabbing both his arms. But Castro manages to open the valve with his elbow, by raising the elbow above his head. Success! USA is no more...
kunYomi: わきま.える、わ.ける、はなびら、あらそ.う
myStory: cái van. phân biệt. riêng tư của hai tay
words:
勘弁(かんべん): pardon, forgiveness, forbearance
代弁(だいべん): pay by proxy, act for another, speak for another
弁解(べんかい): explanation, justification, defence, excuse
弁護(べんご): defense, pleading, advocacy
弁償(べんしょう): next word, compensation, reparation, indemnity, reimbursement
弁論(べんろん): discussion, debate, argument
弁当(べんとう): lunch box
お弁当(おべんとう): lunch box
